article_title: Several changes affect tax income for Massachusetts residents

article_metadata.description:
The April 15 deadline is quickly approaching for the nearly 150 million Americans expected to file 2014 income tax returns.
Showing proof of health insurance, something Massachusetts residents have had to do for several years, is now also part of filing federal tax returns.
It’s one of several changes that took effect.
Health care: When it comes to federal taxes, new requirements linked to the Affordable Care Act — also known as “Obamacare” — are among the biggest
article_metadata.author: Gerry Tuoti

og.site_name: The Taunton Daily Gazette, Taunton, MA
